title: My Lascivious Boss
overview: My Lascivious Boss is about Minh Hoang - the agile and smart boy, but he has to face up with many difficulties in his life. To pay for a living as well as take care of his mother, he's been in 2 different jobs simultaneously. Thanks to the assistance of Quang Lam and Quoc Bao, Minh Hoang's working at the coffee shop. Besides this part-time job, Minh Hoang and his friend - Gia Vy work as a streamer. Back at the coffee shop, Thien Long, a sexy guy, who's always willing to have one night stand with girls to forget My Hanh - Thien Khoi's wife, who also owns this coffee shop. Minh Hoang unfortunately has some trouble with Thien Long.
